project.title: Bunnies & Rabies
project.short_desc: Funny FPP game made for Global Game Jam 2011
project.long_desc:
Bunnies & Rabbies is a mixture of FPP shooter and "game-of-life-like" simulation:
just try to keep colony of sweet bunnies alive as long as you can by eliminating infected individuals in old-fashioned way (with a stick of a dynamite and 12 gauge shotgun).

There are two kinds of rabbits in this game: healthy, pink ones and brown infected with rabies. Rabbits' population is growing and your task is to keep infected ones at bay so they don't transmit their disease any further.
